title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       APPLY FOR A SPECIAL USE PERMIT:   If you would like to use the park for FILMING, WEDDING, OR OTHER SPECIAL EVENT, you must fill out a park permit.  Download the application and directions, once filled out e-mail us or send by mail to Martin Van Buren NHS 1013 Old Post Rd. Kinderhook, NY 12106.
